credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, metal-wrapped silk core, glass beads  
Technique: embroidered using satin, overcasting, knot, stem and drawnwork stitches on plain weave
description: Rectangular sampler with a central wreath enclosing text that reads "Y. A. 1837".  Embroidered flowers and drawnwork designs fill the remaining area. Different patterns of floral garlands are worked along the four edges.
name: Sampler
